column5: The tenth International Conference on Information and Communication Technologies and Development (ICTD 2019), to be hosted at the Indian Institute of Management (Ahmedabad) January 4-7, 2019, invites you to submit your work. To be held in cooperation with ACM SIGCAS, ICTD 2019 will provide an international forum for scholarly researchers to explore the role of information and communication technologies (ICTs) in the context of social, political, and economic development.
